item.title: CVE-2024-25027|2024-03-31T11:40:11.155Z -- IBM -- Security Verify Access Docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.6 could disclose sensitive snapshot information due to missing encryption. IBM X-Force ID: 281607.
